blog:item.title: New product: DeeEnEs
blog:item.blog:content: A new program to update dynamic DNS accounts DeeEnEs can now be downloaded from the website. Made a first stab a page for this new program, but it still needs a help page. I changed the contents menu on the left again, it now opens and closes any submenus dynamically, but the behaviour I've written to change the background color of the item still doesn't work the way it should.
